EmailTemplate.name: Case Resolved Notification for JP_EN Members
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} has been resolved- Thread Id - {!Case.Thread_Id} : Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(Account.Partner_ID__c == "",Account.FirstName, "DAZN for docomo user")},
Thank you very much for your inquiry.
We sent a response to your enquiry regarding {!Case.Type} 48 hours ago. We just wanted to check if we were able to assist you correctly or if you needed any further assistance.
Please be noted that your case will be closed in 24 hours if we don¬Å't hear back from you.
Thank you very much for being a valuable member of our team.
Privacy Policy https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/privacy
Terms of Use https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
